mapper.select: SELECT qz_seq as qzSeq, img_grp_id AS imgGrpId, qz_nm AS qzNm, to_char(to_timestamp(st_dt||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS stDt, to_char(to_timestamp(end_dt||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS endDt, psh_yn AS pshYn, dsp_yn AS dspYn, mx_prt AS mxPrt, to_char(to_timestamp(reg_dt||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS regDt, mod_dt AS modDt, view_cnt AS viewCnt, use_yn AS useYn FROM internsc.tb_qz where qz_seq = ${qzSeq}

SELECT qz_det_seq as quizDetSeq, qz_seq as quizSeq, type_cd as quizTyCd, img_grp_id as imgGrpId, qz_dtl_seq as quizDtlSeq, qz_qst as quizQst, ans_use_yn as ansUseYn, cmt_use_yn as cmtUseYn, cmt_cnt as cmtCnt, ab_img_yn as abImgYn, qz_ans as quizAns, crt_ans_clv as crtAnsClv, wrg_ans_clv as wrgAnsClv, not_use_clv as notUseClv FROM internsc.tb_qz_dtl where qz_seq = ${qzSeq} order by qz_dtl_seq

SELECT img_seq as imgSeq, img_grp_id as imgGrpId, img_ty_cd as imgTyCd, path, fe_nm as feNm, enc_fe_nm as encFeNm, fe_ext as feExt, fe_sz as feSz, reg_dt as regDt, mod_dt as modDt, use_yn as useYn, img_odr as imgOdr FROM internsc.tb_img WHERE img_grp_id = #{imgGrpId} AND use_yn = #{useYn} ORDER BY img_odr

SELECT opt_seq as optSeq, img_grp_id as imgGrpId, qz_seq as qzSeq, qz_det_seq as qzDetSeq, opt_cnt as optCnt, use_yn as useYn FROM internsc.tb_opt WHERE qz_det_seq=${qzDetSeq} and use_yn='Y' order by qz_det_seq
select count(*) from internsc.tb_ptc ptc inner join internsc.tb_qz_dtl tqd on ptc.qz_det_seq = tqd.qz_det_seq where tqd.qz_seq = ${qzSeq}

with table1 (ptcAns, ansCnt) as ( select '0', coalesce((select count(ptc_ans) as ansCnt from internsc.tb_ptc where qz_det_seq = ${qzDetSeq} and ptc_ans = '0' group by ptc_ans),0) union all select '1', coalesce((select count(ptc_ans) as ansCnt from internsc.tb_ptc where qz_det_seq = ${qzDetSeq} and ptc_ans = '1' group by ptc_ans),0) ) select * from table1
mapper.update: UPDATE internsc.tb_qz set qz_nm = #{qzNm}, st_dt = to_timestamp(#{stDt}||' 00:00:00.000','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), end_dt = to_timestamp(#{endDt}||' 23:59:59.999','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), psh_yn = #{pshYn}, mx_prt = cast(#{mxPrt} as int), mod_dt = current_timestamp where qz_seq = cast(#{qzSeq} as int)

UPDATE internsc.tb_qz_dtl set type_cd = #{quizTyCd}, qz_qst = #{quizQst}, ans_use_yn = #{ansUseYn}, cmt_use_yn = #{cmtUseYn}, qz_dtl_seq = cast(#{quizDtlSeq} as int), cmt_cnt = #{cmtCnt}, ab_img_yn = #{abImgYn}, qz_ans = cast(#{quizAns} as int), crt_ans_clv = cast(#{crtAnsClv} as int), wrg_ans_clv = cast(#{wrgAnsClv} as int), not_use_clv = cast(#{notUseClv} as int), mod_dt = current_timestamp where qz_det_seq = cast(#{quizDetSeq} as int)
UPDATE internsc.tb_opt set img_grp_id = #{imgGrpId}, opt_cnt = #{optCnt}, use_yn = #{useYn} where opt_seq = cast(#{optSeq} as int)

update internsc.tb_img set img_grp_id = #{imgGrpId}, img_ty_cd = #{imgTyCd}, path = #{path}, fe_nm = #{feNm}, enc_fe_nm = #{encFeNm}, fe_ext = #{feExt}, fe_sz = #{feSz}, reg_dt = #{regDt}, mod_dt = #{modDt}, use_yn = #{useYn}, img_odr = #{imgOdr} where img_seq = #{imgSeq}
